name: sh
description:
sh - 16th in "focus" (aa, uu, ff, au, rr, ao, rl, sp, th, ki, ci, sn, lo, ba, ov, sh, fi, do, ru & ti)

Get ready and shake. Shake as fast as you can for 5 seconds. Use whatever technique you like, just shake your phone.

You can also top the leaderboard and compete for the best score / most shakes. Get stuck into the addiction of lo right now, a nice addition to your collection of focused General Adaptive apps.

Thanks for all your support, I hope you're enjoying the "focus" series thus far.

Handmade in Australia,
General Adaptive
